encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

bibl.title: Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World. [With Map-by-map Directory on CD-ROM.] Map Editors: Mary E. DOWNS, M. Joann McDANIEL, Cartographic Managers: Janet E. KELLY, Jeannine M. SCHONTA, David F. STONG.
bibl.note: Comprehensive atlas compiled by a team of 10 "vicars" or regional coordinators (Libya and Nile Valley: Roger S. BAGNALL), 73 compilers, and 95 reviewers. Accompanied by a Map-by-map Directory on CD-ROM (a printed version of the Directory is distributed separately). - See in part. maps 73-83: 73. Ammon (compiler: D.J. MATTINGLY); - 74. Delta (A. BERNAND); - 75. Memphis - Oxyrhynchus (R. MÃœLLER-WOLLERMANN); - 76. Sinai (D.F. GRAF); - 77. Hermopolis Magna (M. DREW-BEAR); - 78. Porphyrites et Claudianus Montes (S.E. SIDEBOTHAM); - 79. Oasis Magna (G. WAGNER); - 80. Coptos - Berenice (J. KEENAN, S.E. SIDEBOTHAM, T. WILFONG); - 81. Triakontaschoinos (S.M. BURSTEIN, with the assistance of D. BOROUGH); - 82. Meroe (N.B. MILLET); - 83. Nabataea Meridionalis (D.F. GRAF).
